info.title: SearchCarriers
info.description: # üëã Welcome to the API! Thanks for checking out the API! I'm super excited for you to give it a whirl. üöÄ > **I want your feedback!** üì£ > > What features are you dreaming of? üí° Found a pesky bug? üêû Got a brilliant suggestion? ‚ú® > > Let me know! Your input is super valuable in helping craft the *best* API possible. > > Send an email to garrett@searchcarriers.com Happy searching! ## P.S. Getting Started with API Tokens ‚úçÔ∏è To use this API, you'll need an authentication token. You can generate your API token by: 1. Going to your profile settings 2. Navigating to the API Tokens section at /settings/api-tokens 3. Creating a new token with the appropriate permissions Remember to keep your token secure and never share it publicly! üòâ

get.description:
The all-in-one search endpoint.

Search by the super search term or use specific fields to refine

parameters.name: superSearchTerm
parameters.description: Super search a string or phrase

parameters.name: useSuperWideSearch
parameters.description: Allow super search to find anything remotely related, in case of not having good results with the default behaviour

get.description: Retrieves the ordered history for a given authority (MC, FF, or MX number)

parameters.name: docketNumber
parameters.description: Docket number (MC, FF, or MX number)

get.description: Gets the self-reported truck trailer and driver count for a given company

parameters.name: sinceMonths
parameters.description: Number of months to look back

parameters.name: sinceMonths
parameters.description: Number of months to look back for data

parameters.name: equipmentType
parameters.description: Filter by type of equipment (truck, trailer, other)

get.description: Export the provided companies as the specific format

post.description: Update the watch types for a company for the authenticated user.

watch_types.description: Array of watch types to sync

get.description: Get all company watches for the authenticated user filtered by dot number.
Get all company watches for the authenticated user
Returns information related to a SCAC
Get all related companies for a given VIN.
